Name: require_project_status_active
Description: Only active projects can be optimized

Name: require_user_story_status_todo
Description: Only 'To Do' user stories are schedulable

Name: require_role_assigned
Description: Every worker must have a defined role

Name: require_velocity_positive
Description: Velocity must be greater than zero

Name: require_sprint_goal_defined
Description: Each sprint must have a defined goal

Name: require_release_status_draft
Description: Only draft releases can be modified

Name: require_board_updated_daily
Description: Scrum board must be updated daily
